issue.title: [Java] TestEndianness.testLittleEndian fails on big endian platform
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9704](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9704). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`TestEndianness.testLittleEndian` assumes that the data layout of int is little-endian. Thus, this test fails on a big-endian platform.
